choices: Super Spunky the super bloated monster.

11.content:
Now then here are a few stories to choose from.

Super Spunky the super bloated monster: In this story yours truly an animated anthropomorphic bobcat transforms into a giant animated anthropomorphic bloated superhero.

The misadventures of Ace the bloated monster: In this story Ace an animated anthropomorphic saber tooth tiger transforms into a bloated monster after drinking a mysterious type of soda pop as he goes on a misadventure or two.

Cartoon Wrestling League: In this story male cartoon characters from the around the world compete in the Cartoon Wrestling League's bloated and or inflated division.
11.title: Male

114.content: What else do you want to choose
114.title: Free Choice Chapter.

11411.content:
It all started one fateful day in Hollywood California during the early part of May 1982 as yours truly Max the anthropomorphic animated dog had finished up working on The Grinch Grinches The Cat In The Hat TV special that was to air on May 20th 1982.

Afterwards I felt thirsty as I went over to a nearby cooler that had a mysterious looking kind of soda pop drink inside known as Nature's Goodness as it also had a warning label on there as well as it mentioned some side effects included instant weight gain and height gain, increase in appetite and hunger and transforming into a giant bloated monster.

I then opened up the cooler and got a soda pop can of Nature's Goodness out of the cooler as I went outside and pulled the tab off of the soda pop can as I started drinking it down until the soda pop can was empty as I threw it into a nearby dumpster.

" *Burp* Excuse Me" I said.

Immediately I started feeling the effects of the Nature's Goodness soda pop drink as I started gaining weight and height as my appetite and hunger itself increased as I then transformed into that of a giant bloated monster whose shadow was now towering over everything and everyone as well.

"What happened to me and why am I now so gigantic and bloated along with being so hungry as well? Well a giant bloated monster's gotta eat everything in sight, so now I'm off to go eat everything in sight." I said as I heavily waddled my way past everyone who was running away from me and screaming in terror as well as I began my rampage.

Now what will happen to yours truly?

11421.content:
Let's start these boys?

Nick: average 14 year old boy with the love of inflating others.

114212.content:
Rin was like any other boy his age but has a secret with his twin sister Lin. They have a thing fire body inflation, at least, Rin does. Lin goes along with it with two requirements. One is to allow her to be mobile under her own strength and the other is the most obvious, do not pop her. They were simple and easy requests to follow that he agreed to. Though there was a movement to legalize body inflation.

"I'm for it but they're making a mistake for that." Rin said.

"Same here but would be nice not to be suppressed by those muscle heads." Lin said.

That got them thinking. They had a couple relatives within the law that could help. Though they should let this pass before screwing something up. For now, they just relaxed and enjoyed the day.
114212.title: Rin

1142122.content:
The next day, the twins were out when Lin saw an interesting poster. It was for an interesting contest for any formal not afraid to be blown up like a balloon. She has multiple times by her own twin brother and like it. The prize was $5,000 and a vacation to an island paradise. Seeing that, she wanted in.

"Are you sure you want to?" Rin asked.

"Of course I do. I'll split the $5,000 with you and take you with me." Lin said.

They went to the location and for Lin in. They gave her a pair of elastic athletic shorts and a large shirt to wear before bringing her up. The crowd got a good look at her and the four others who are partaking in it. Lin can tell she would win but with a challenge. They were given a hose and put them into their mouths. Water came rushing down and filling them up. Lin liked how cool and refreshing it is. Their bellies began pushing out and Lin decided to get some popularity going and showed it off as it grew.

"You can do this Lin. I know my dear sister can do this." Rin thought.

"With all that you've done to me, the trip and money is ours." Lin thought.

"You can hear me?"

"We're twins, we have a mental connection to do so with each other when needed."

Lin kept going with her belly getting bigger and bigger by the second. 2 gave out and couldn't go on with a third soon to follow. When she stopped, Lin felt her belly real quick. She was getting quite full and was nearing her limits but has some give left. The other one was struggling to keep going and standing was a challenge. She eventually gave and Lin smiled. She gestured for them to keep going until she was as full as can be. When here, they stopped the water.

"Admire all you want. This belly cannot be touched unless by by brother and the judges!" Lin said.

She had a few photos of her taken before getting off stage. She collected her money and the tickets for the island before meeting up with Rin. She took his hand and put it into her belly to feel before leaning into his ear.

"This is all because of you." Lin whispered.

The had some fun while they could before heading home. It was going to be a while before she lets it out for she was trained to hold form for quite a while and she was as tough as she is sweet.
1142122.title: Lin enter a contest

11421222.content:
After the successful win, Lin gave half of the money to Rin as promised and will take him to the island vacation. They got ready to go when all the water in Lin was out. They soon were on their way and were going to have fun. Once there, Lin saw the beach from their hotel room.

"I hope there are some cute boys to see." Lin said.

"Just hope they don't blow you up to explode." Rin said.

Lin liked that her brother was watching out for her but he can be a bit much. They were in one of the nicest rooms of the hotel so they were quite in the position. It was worth it with the kind body Lin has. She threw on the bikini she brought before heading down to the beach. She had an idea and it would help if she had proper fitting clothes one, hence why the bikini. Rin soon joined her and can tell she was up to something.
11421222.title: They go to the island

choices: Lin and Rin enter a competition
114212221.content:
Rin and Lin enjoyed the island as they hoped and all they had to offer. On the third day there, Lin wanted to have a little fun with her brother. They had the $5,000 split between them still and the money their mother gave them to use so it was good to spend. They were passing by a small gas station when she pulled him off. He wondered what she was planning until he saw they were going toward the air hose.

"Are you going to blow yourself up?" Rin asked.

"Not at all. I'm going to blow you up." Lin said.

"Why do you want that?"

"You're asking too many questions. I can't be the only balloon twin, even if I look better as one."

Lin shoved the hose into Rin's butt and it started. Rin jumped at the feeling of the air shooting into him but liked it. His belly began ballooning up and he liked it. He might not be able to get as big as his sister or look as good as she does inflated but he would do so for her. Lin liked how her brother was looking and kept going until he was big enough. His pants button was about to pop off and they didn't want that to happen. Lin took the hose out and they continued on.
114212221.title: Lin inflates Rin

choices: Lin and Rin enter a competition
1142122212.content:
Rin liked how it feels to be inflated like he has done to Lin and how it looks on him. Lin liked it as well and how well he was inflated. They enjoyed the rest of the day and eventually were back at their hotel room. Looking at him, she decided to make him bigger. She got the hand pump they slipped into ther luggage and got ready.

"Let me guess, you want me bigger?" Rin asked.

"For sure. You did it many times to me before so I want you to be bigger than you are now." Lin said.

She shoved the hose into Rin's butt and began pumping. They liked it and wondered how big he could get. They liked it and kept going. Rin managed got get his pants button undone under his growing belly so it doesn't become ruined or pop him. Lin could fix them but didn't have the tools to do so. It kept going until Rin felt like he was going to blow. Lin gave a couple more pumps before stopping. She liked it and how big her twin was. Rin liked it as well and wondered what it would be like if both of them were like this and had some fun.
1142122212.title: Lin pushes Rin bigger

1142123.content:
With all the protests going on, Rin and Lin wondered how it all would play out. So far, it wasn't going well. They weren't worried for as fat as they can tell, body inflation isn't illegal. As long as a person isn't killed, then they can get away with it. That afternoon, Rin decided to mess with Lin. She was laying on her bed, feet kicked up and pants exposing her butt a bit.

"I can tell you're looking at me, Rin." Lin said.

"Let's have a little fun." Rin said.

He shoved a hose into her butt and started the pump. Lin jumped at the hose going in and air starting. She tried pulling the hose out and stopping the pump but Rin kept it in. Lin liked at her inflating butt and thighs as they kept inflating bigger and bigger by the second. Her pants managed to hold up nicely while it happened until he decided she was big enough. Lin liked it as well and got up to check it as well. She liked it and knew this was good. She wanted to be bigger but didn't want to be too big for pants or to go through doors. She liked it and got the hose out.
1142123.title: Rin messes with her

11421231.content:
Lin got adjusted to her larger rear and how it feels. Rin liked it as well, especially with how she could get bigger. She does have her limits but she could always get bigger last them. Their mother liked how Rin was up to his usual fun and Lin was enjoying it. Though she was unaware of what's bound to happen next, nor did Lin. Rin wanted his sister to be bigger no matter what.

"You're kidding, right? You seriously think I could get bigger?" Lin asked.

"I'm as serious as I can be. If there's anything I can tell about my sister when it comes to being inflated like a balloon, you can always get bigger." Rin said.

"Then put this back in and get going."

Rin put the hose back into his sister and started the pump. The air shot back into her and she watched as her already large backside get bigger. Her pants were holding up nicely and she enjoyed it. She put her hands onto it as she continued to get bigger and bigger. She looked at her brother and decided to mess with him a bit.

"I must really have really let myself go. Mind making me happy again, Rin?" Lin asked.

Rin almost fell into it but caught on. If it wasn't for their twin connection, he would definitely fall for his sisters trick. He went ahead and had little fun with her. It was only right in case the worst happens. They enjoyed their sibling love and being twins even when they collide. When Lin felt like she was going to explode, Rin pulled the hose out and stopped the pump. He then gave it a hard slap which made Lin jump and blush. It was a tight squeeze but Lin managed to get through and to the living area.
11421231.title: Rin pushes her more

11421233.content:
The law didn't pass like it was suppose to be but a different one was put into affect. This one limits how many legal inflators and inflatees can be out in the public for their own pleasure. Lin and Rin went to apply and were nearly denied due to their age. But they were let on to be tested.

"Not many girls would admit this but I enjoy being blown up like a balloon by my twin brother here." Lin said.

"She means it. If one of us is going to do this, both of us will." Rin said.

They feared Rin first and were somewhat impressed with his results. They got to Lin and were amazed by her flexibility and calmness while being blown up. She had done this many times before by Rin that nothing really shakes her while it happens. When they were finished, they waited patiently. Minutes passed before they were given inflation licenses. These licenses allow them to inflate and be inflated whenever and how ever they wanted. They had some restrictions but nothing major. Lin looked at her brother and got an idea of what to do. Rin noticed his sisters devious look and knew that when she looks like that, he was in for it without a way out.
11421233.title: They get a licence

114212331.content:
Lin and Rin enjoyed having an inflation license and the perks that comes from it. A week after getting them, they received a check in the mail. This was odd and they opened them up and liked it. They were the first 2 to officially become legal inflationists with licenses so they were given pay. Each week they were going to get $750 a week each and liked it. Lin looked at Rin and got an idea. Before they applied for the license, Rin was never really inflated like Lin was.

"What are you thinking?" Rin asked.

"Nothing really. Though I want to inflate you like you've done to me so many times before." Lin said.

"Is that so? Lets do it and you can choose what we use."

There were so many she could choose and she settled on one. She had chose...
114212331.title: Lin inflates Rin
